head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOWIE, KENNETH GIRARD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOWIE, KENNETH GIRARD

block.p: HOWIE-Kenneth Girard. of Fair Haven, NJ on May 25, 2000. Loving husband of Anna Grace nee Dovell. Loving father of Steven Girard, and David Winthrop Howie and Elizabeth Howie Keightley. Funeral services to be held Wednesday 11AM from St. Georges by the River Episcopal Church, Waterman Avenue, Rumson, NJ. Burial services private. Memorial donations to the church or to the Monmouth Medical Center, Long Branch, NJ are preferred.
